Captain's Log is a note-taking app for nostr.

![demo](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/29136904/342766691-5ccfc513-665d-4231-9962-52443a00639c.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..5Pm88ki38an7dQEtapIrtuP33YgB0vsz4N32mCGCVIc)

## For Developers

To install the dependencies & run the app in development mode, run the following command:

```bash
wails3 dev
```
